title: Invesco and Galaxy Asset Management Have Cut Fees for Spot Bitcoin ETF Down to 0.25%
description: Invesco and Galaxy Asset Management have made a strategic move to attract more investors to their spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF), Invesco Galaxy Bitcoin ETF (BTCO).
